title: The Regretful Life of Richard Bell
description: Richard Bell is an old, bitter man. He once had everything--money, a family, prestige, a place in the community--until he frittered it all away. Now, he knows it is too late to change things. He can barely walk and manages to hurt himself badly while sleeping. With those limitations, how can he fix the lamentable situation he's made of his life?But this is Middle Falls, where everyone gets a second chance.The Regretful Lives of Richard Bell is the sixteenth book in the Middle Falls Time Travel Series. Like all Middle Falls stories, it can be read as a standalone novel, or as part of the series.
author: Shawn Inmon
